flawed_nl_solution:
Since one-third of the class participated, there are 39 * 1/3 = <<39*1/3=117>>117 students who participated in the competition.
This means that 39 - 117 = <<39-117=-78>>-78 students did not participate.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 117. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
